Title: Covert War
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (creator), Joshua Brand, Melissa James Gibson, Sneha Koorse (staff writer), Mike Batistick (staff writer)
Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Holly Taylor, Keidrich Sellati
Plot: In Moscow, Viktor Zhukov is assassinated in the escalating tensions between the two countries. When Elizabeth learns that her personal mentor has been murdered she risks everything to avenge his death.
